entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gogama

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 near midnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
